items.title: Goldman's top trades for the first quarter include long Nike and short Ford
items.description: Goldman picked Nike as a top long idea for the next quarter and believes that shares can recover as demand and profitability accelerate.

items.title: Here are Mizuho's top picks for January including Chewy
items.description: Mizuho's list also includes a key e-commerce firm.

items.title: Quantum stocks like Rigetti plunge after Nvidia's Huang says the computers are 15 to 30 years away
items.description: Quantum computing stocks dropped Wednesday after Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang declared that useful quantum computers are likely decades in the future.

items.title: European wind stocks tumble after Trump says he will stop new turbine construction
items.description: The president-elect went on a lengthy attack against wind turbines during a news conference.

items.title: A once popular tech play has lost its way. How to capitalize on it using options
items.description: Tony Zhang describes a debit vertical spread in Western Digital.
